attributes.action: Move a family off the top floor of flats which has mould and risk of child falling
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: My husband, 4 year old daughter and 4 month old baby live on the top floor (7th) of high rise flats We have mould growing on the walls next to the windows which is bad for our health.We also get silverfish in the evenings in our living room, bathroom and kitchen, these are not harmfull but it is very unhygenic. Our daughter can easily climb on the window sills and it wont be long until she figures out how to undo the windows. The council have been out and said there is nothing they can do about the mould. Please help

rejection.details: Can I suggest that you continue to communicate with your local authority over this issue.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
